stackingpara2: Great way to increase your AGOD holdingsPassive income without lots of timeinvestedFunds are deposited in a smart contractNo minimum investment required.
stackingpara3: You'll probably be asking yourself where do these rew√°rds come from?
stackingpara4: Staking gives AGOD token holders rewards from transaction fees generated in the ecosystem.
stackingpara5: Transaction fees are collected from all Agoders inside the ecosystem
stackingpara6: and then are distributed through smart contracts to staked AGOD holders
